text.text_translated: Perhaps dreams happen because our mind is organising the thoughts we have during the day. In our dreams, these thoughts appear with a hidden meaning. When we are awake, our thoughts are usually in the form of words, like conversations that we have with ourselves. However, when we are asleep, the part of our brain for language becomes less active, while the part for our emotions becomes more active.

best_attempt.text_translated: Perhaps dreams happen because our mind is organising the thoughts we have during the day, but in our dreams these thoughts appear with a symbolic meaning. When we are awake, our thoughts are usually in the form of words, like conversations that we have with ourselves. However, when we are asleep, the part of our brain which controls language becomes less active. At the same time, the part that controls our emotions becomes more active.
